sentence: what are the populations of all the major cities in montana ?
sentence-with-vars: what are the populations of all the major cities in state0 ?
sql: select city.population from city where city.state_name = ' montana ' and city.population > 150000 ;
sql-with-vars: select city.population from city where city.state_name = ' state0 ' and city.population > number0 ;
